item.title: My researcher's positionality statement
item.description: This is my researcherâ€™s positionality statement (see this paper for context). It is a work in progress, in two senses: In one sense, it is not exhaustive and I will be adding statements as they occur to me. In the other sense, it is an ever-changing document, since I will frequently change my mind about any of the statements herein. 1 The statements In random-ish order, divided by category (for now, epistemological and ontological).
